info.name: Steven Universe Theme - Sweet Flirt
info.description:
Preview : http://s15.postimg.org/ghpmue42z/sfss.jpg 

This is a style for Sweet Flirt, the romanian version of Amour Sucre but you can use this to any version you want like Corazon de melon, Amor doce, My Candy Love, Sweet Crush, Dolce flirt, Minsode Flirt ,  Askito-M, etc.
Hope you like it.
